title: Retro Hiking & Mountaineering
description: Scale the heights of outdoor adventure history and recall the legendary expeditions, trails, and hiking culture of decades past!

questions.question: Sir Edmund Hillary and Tenzing Norgay became the first climbers confirmed to reach the summit of Mount Everest in what year?
Edmund Hillary was from which country?

The Boy Scouts of America, founded in 1910, popularized outdoor skills. What was the highest rank a Scout could achieve?
Which famous outdoor company, started in 1938 by Lloyd and Mary Anderson, became a cooperative for hikers and climbers?

options: No country - it ends in Washington state
